message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but $120 is too low for me. Could you do $170?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $155.
